rich-text-icon.label: Rich text icon:
rich-text-icon.description: Copy this tag and paste it in-game into a text to get the icon instead.

cheat-command.label: Cheat command:
cheat-command.description: Execute this command in the in-game console to cheat the item into your inventory. This will disable achievements!

client-failure.title: Unexpected client error
client-failure.description: The client triggered an unexpected error, like... running out of iron. Please reload the page and try again.

page-not-found.title: Page not found
page-not-found.description: The thing you are searching for does not exist.

server-failure.title: Internal server error
server-failure.description: The server responded with some incomprehensible gibberish, maybe a new babel fish is needed. Please reload the page and try again.

service-not-available.title: Service not available
service-not-available.description: The connection to the server could not be established. Please make sure all biters are defeated and check back later.

footer.copyright-disclaimer: Content and images are owned by <1>Wube Software</1> and the <3>mod authors</3> respectively.

machine.character-notice: This recipe can be crafted by hand without additional machines as long as the required items are in the inventory.
machine.headline: Producible in {{count}} machine

locale.label: Language:
locale.description: The translations of the items, recipes etc. are provided by the mods themselves. Missing translations are replaced with English, the same way they are in-game.

recipe-mode.label: Recipe mode:
recipe-mode.description: The recipe mode defines how to handle recipes with a normal and an expensive variant. Select "Normal mode" or "Expensive mode" to only display that variant, or "Hybrid mode" to display both variants with the expensive one being marked in red.

data-availability.description-1: The export of data to a combination of mods is fully automated. The server will download the required mods from the mod portal, launch the game to dump all the required data, and add it to the database.
data-availability.description-2: The automatic data export has some limitations:
data-availability.description-3: If these limitations are not met the displayed data may not be accurate. When in doubt please check the data in-game.
data-availability.description-4: Please be aware that as long as the data is not available the Factorio Item Browser will display the unmodded Vanilla data. Depending on the load on the server the data export will take some time. So continue playing for now and check back later.
data-availability.description-limit-1: The export always uses the latest version of the game and the mods. Older versions are not supported.
data-availability.description-limit-2: The export uses the default settings of the mods. No changes to these settings can be made.
data-availability.description-limit-3: All mods except the base mod must be available on the Factorio Mod Portal.
data-availability.headline: 2. Data availability

button.select-or-drag: Select your <1>mod-list.json</1> file or drag it here.

upload-file.description-1: Please select your mod-list.json file from the mods directory of your game installation. This file contains a list of mods you are currently using. The Factorio Item Browser needs this combination of mods to provide you the correct data.
upload-file.description-2: In a default installation you find the mod-list.json file at the following location:
upload-file.description-3: Note: No file is uploaded to the server. The selected file gets processed directly in your browser, and only the list of mod names is send to the server.
upload-file.headline: 1. Combination of mods

message.invalid-file: The selected file was invalid and could not be processed. Are you sure you selected a valid mod-list.json file?
message.no-mods: The selected file did not contain any mods. Are you sure you selected a valid mod-list.json file?

available.headline: Data is available.
available.description: The data for your combination of mods is already available. Save the new setting and start browsing!

errored.headline: Data export has failed.
errored.description: A previously triggered data export of these mods has failed. Sorry, but the required data cannot be made available at this point.
errored.description-global: You are viewing the unmodded Vanilla data. The data export of your mods has failed. Sorry, but the required data cannot be made available at this point.
errored.description-setting: The data export for this setting has failed. Only the unmodded Vanilla data is available. Sorry, but the required data cannot be made available at this point.

pending.headline: Data export is waiting.
pending.description: The data export of these mods was already triggered and is currently waiting to get its turn.
pending.description-global: You are viewing the unmodded Vanilla data. The data of your combination of mods is waiting to get exported from the game and is not yet available.
pending.description-setting: The data for this setting is waiting to get exported. Only the unmodded Vanilla data is available.

unknown.headline: Data is currently not available.
unknown.description: The data for these mods is currently not available and a data export gets triggered when saving the new setting.
